hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Salimah said:"I came to 'Ali with two other men and he said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to come out of the toilet and recite Qur'an, and he would eat meat with us and nothing would prevent him from (reciting) Qur'an except Janabah

chapter.ara-name: باب حَجْبِ الْجُنُبِ مِنْ قِرَاءَةِ الْقُرْآنِ
chapter.eng-name: The Junub Person Being Prevented From Reciting The Qur'an
